guides_intro: Learn more about character rigging, Unity/Unreal workflows, and best practices
guide_mixamo_desc: Professional auto rigging service as an alternative to Mixamo. Get rigged characters with 50+ animations.

guide_obj_desc: How to auto rig OBJ characters. What works, what breaks, and preparation tips.
guide_retargeting_desc: Guide to retargeting animations in Unity & Unreal. Simple pipeline for auto-rigged characters.

service_rig_desc: AI-powered bone generation and skinning for your 3D characters
